misc: Famous for being an ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting.
biography: Timo, a golfer of considerable renown, hails from the esteemed Keimola Golf club. A figure of both intensity and unwavering dedication, Timo approaches each tournament with a seriousness that endears him to his many fans.

He has graced the Hector Trophée with his presence on eight occasions, a testament to his enduring commitment to this storied tournament. His prowess has led him to victory three times, a clear indication of his capabilities in pair play.

Beyond his achievements on the course, Timo is also celebrated for his role as an ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting. Ever willing to share his knowledge, Timo is a valuable asset to the world of golf. Though Timo will not be participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, his impact on the sport remains undeniable.
